They say it's a government takeover of healthcare. A big lie, just like[ Nazi propaganda minister Joseph] Goebbels.`` You say it enough and you repeat the lie, repeat the lie, repeat the lie until eventually people believe it. Like blood libel, that's the same kind of thing, he added.`` The Germans said enough about the Jews and people believed it, and you have the Holocaust.''
